title: Jake's Take
description: Jake checks all the boxes as the perfect child of suburban America but still manages to explore the sinister side of his nature. Is anyone smart enough to catch him?Jake's Take is a suspenseful work of fiction which provides an engaging play upon the realities of suburban life. Readers will be shocked and intrigued as sex, drug use, technology and social conformity are exploited and used for manipulation. They will question whether the events depicted in this story actually occurred as the secrets of the suburban American family are brought to life in a jarringly relatable manner.A suspenseful thriller for adults. For mature audiences only.
author: D.K. Rodgers
